title: Dropping The Hammer With The Contenders
itunes:title: Dropping The Hammer With The Contenders
description: This week the Cigar Authority is broadcasting live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Nashua, NH from the La Flor Dominicana Studios. We welcome to the show Eric Wentworth from Hammer + Sickle Cigars as we light up past Cigar of the Year winner, Hammer + Sickle Trademark. We will also unveil the seven cigars that are The Contenders for Cigar of the Year. In the second hour we will light up the La Galera Habano from the The Cigar Authority Care Package. Join us for this and all the madness known as The Cigar Authority
